pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Surrogate Synchrony // Multivariate Surrogate Synchrony ('mvSUSY') estimates the synchrony within datasets that contain more than two time series. 'mvSUSY' was developed from Surrogate Synchrony ('SUSY') with respect to implementing surrogate controls, and extends synchrony estimation to multivariate data. 'mvSUSY' works as described in Meier Tschacher (2021).
